text: is a former Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Tsubota was born in Nagasaki Prefecture on January 23, 1956. After graduating from Hosei University, he joined Japan Soccer League club Yanmar Diesel in 1979. The club won the league champions in 1980. The club also won 1983 and 1984 JSL Cup. He retired in 1992. He played 175 games in the league. On March 8, 1981, Tsubota debuted for the Japan national team against South Korea. In 1983 and 1984, he played at 1984 Summer Olympics qualification.
